headline.print_headline: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Fared Friday
headline.main: How the Dow Jones Industrial Average Fared Friday

lead_paragraph: The stock market ended slightly higher Friday after drifting between small losses and gains for most of the day. Telecom stocks led gains and Verizon Communications was up sharply after Warren Buffett's Berkshire Hathaway revealed it had a new investment in the company.
